channel.title: Help Menu (Delta)
channel.description:
How can I make a help menu?
Ex ::help opens up a menu with info i put in it

item.title: Help Menu (Delta)
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

fix it your self ?

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") && (playerRights >= 0)) {
				String name = command.substring(5);
				        sendQuest("~Paradise Commands~", 8144);  //Title
					sendQuest("", 8145);
					clearQuestInterface();
					sendQuest("", 8148);
					sendQuest("", 8149);
					sendQuest("", 8150);
					sendQuest("", 8151);
					sendQuest("::players - shows how many players are online", 8152);
					sendQuest("::changepassword - changes your password", 8153);
					sendQuest("::donationinfo - shows information about donating", 8154);
					sendQuest("::removedonor - removes donor crown permanently", 8155);
					sendQuestSomething(8143);
					showInterface(8134);
					flushOutStream();
}

item.title: Help Menu (Delta)
item.dc:creator: @CookieScape CookieScape
item.description:
@CookieScape wrote:

Just write a command that opens an interface… It’s not that hard. Just C+P it from another part of your server and change the text.
